1.title: Introduction to JavaScript
1.content: Learn the basics of JavaScript and why it's essential for web development.

1.title: Variables and Data Types
1.content: Master variables, data types, and type coercion in JavaScript.

1.title: Functions and Scope
1.content: Understand functions, scope, and closures in JavaScript.

2.title: HTML Basics
2.content: Learn HTML structure and semantic elements.

2.title: CSS Fundamentals
2.content: Master CSS styling, selectors, and layouts.

2.title: Responsive Design
2.content: Create responsive websites using media queries and flexbox.

3.title: React Basics
3.content: Introduction to React components and JSX.

3.title: React Hooks
3.content: Master useState, useEffect, and custom hooks.

3.title: State Management
3.content: Learn state management with Redux and Context API.

4.title: ES6 Features
4.content: Explore arrow functions, destructuring, and template literals.

4.title: Advanced Patterns
4.content: Learn design patterns and best practices.
